price: Pusti ih neka jedu i naslađuju se, i neka ih zavara nada – znat će oni!
arabic: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُواْ وَيَتَمَتَّعُواْ وَيُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dharhum yakulū wayatamattaʿū wayul'hihimu al-amalu fasawfa yaʿlamūna
